Text.Value: Mmmpf. Meat. MEAT.

EditorData.AnimationTags: Crimson eats meat on the floor

Text.Value: You hungry, boy? You want some meat?
*Hiss.*
Her pain and fury are festering wounds - she sees the hunters who murdered her cubs in every face.

EditorData.NodeContext: discussing the displacer beast in the other cage. Voice full of empathy for his friend, even if she would reect it

Text.Value: *At the mention of the word 'meat', his stance softens.*
I don't have any food for you, but I'll be back - I promise.
I don't have any food for you, but I will be back - I promise.
Your scent - your friend freed me from hunger's lust.
Mimic the beast's body language to get a closer look.
*You can tell only one thing - this beast will kill at the first opportunity.*
Easy, I'm not going to hurt you.
*With every bite, the beast seems to calm.*
Here, eat this.
*You meet a cold stare marked by ferocity.*

EditorData.logicalname: Met - but didn't do animal handling check

Text.Value: If anyone should feel ashamed, it's the circus - they were starving you!
Here - I have something else you can eat.
*The creature stares at you with unmitigated fury - marking you as his next meal.*
He wore the face of Dribbles, but the scent of a stranger. He taunted me, waving bloodied rags under my nose. My mind was worn from the hunger.
Thank you for calming me - before I hurt my family.
You - you freed me from hunger's lust.
And with my dying breath I would have thanked you.
You are like Dribbles. You chose to save her - from herself. She will not thank you - but I do.
*Crunch. Crunch.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: Crimson eats meat on the floor

Text.Value: May you and your family have full bellies and a warm place to rest - always. Be well.
Your friend, the displacer beast, seemed hells-bent on killing everyone, too.
Forgive me. I was close to killing you - killing everyone. I am ashamed.
Dribbles is - was - helping her see life anew. But she was not ready.

EditorData.NodeContext: sadness - he saw dribbles as a friend

Text.Value: Examine the animal.
You deserve to be treated better - I'll open up your cage.
*Hollow eyes, pale gums - this beast isn't angry, he's starving.*
Leave.
*Gasp.* Mmmpf.

EditorData.AnimationTags: Crimson eats meat ravenously (aggressive greedy) on the floor
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: player does a throwing motion to toss something into cage, Crimson dips his head to eat ravenously.
EditorData.NodeContext: player has dropped meat on the ground in front of him. Dips head eating ravenously.

Text.Value: You aren't getting a bite out of me.
*He growls a clear warning.*
*Hiss.*

EditorData.logicalname: Passed animal handling but didn't feed meat

Text.Value: *He whimpers in gratitude and falls on the morsel instantly.*

EditorData.SFXTags: [DP] Dinosaur whimpering with happiness, followed by eating noises

Text.Value: Is someone hungry? TOO BAD.
*Sated by his meal, the beast's eyes shine with gratitude.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: Crimson eats meat on the floor

Text.Value: NO. Flesh. Meat. NOW. NOW. NOW.

EditorData.NodeContext: Player has said they don't have any meat. Losing his MIND. Roaring, yelling, in pain with the hunger.

Text.Value: BLOOD soaked. JAW locked. FEAST ON ALL. ALL.

EditorData.NodeContext: Player has refused to feed Crimson. He's losing MIND. Roaring, yelling, in pain with the hunger.

Text.Value: The HUNGER. My stomach SCREAMS. Press your FLESH through BARS. A hand. A HEAD. BLOOD. Meat.

EditorData.NodeContext: Frothing out the mouth, INSANE with hunger.

Text.Value: Let me BITE YOU. BLEED YOU. Meat. MEAT.

EditorData.NodeContext: Frothing out the mouth, INSANE with hunger.

Text.Value: Leave.
*Teeth bared, the creature is near rabid in his bloodlust.*
The circus is my family - they rescued me when I was but a youngling. They did not starve me - the other did.
I'd have killed you before you hurt anyone here.
You can, but I will not cross the threshold.

Synopsis:
Crimson the dinosaur is one of the animals who will participate in the doppelganger-dribbles attack. Player can examine him and realise Crimson isn't angry, he's starving. If the player feeds him some meat, he is so busy eating during the attack that he doesn't participate.
In the bottom branch, he's so hungry that he's on the brink of losing his mind - he's snapping, furious, and all he craves is meat.
